name: Delivery Mayhem (Daham Belpage)
description:
- Entry for Zeno Game Jam 4 -

In this game you are a drone delivering packages. You have to go everywhere to find your destination while battling flying enemies. 

Deliver as many packages as you can without dying. 

How to play:

  • Use 'W' & 'S' and move around the world.
  • Move forward until you come across the platform with enemies surrounding it.

 

  • Kill enemies by clicking on them with the left mouse button.
  • Once all enemies are dead the platform should change color.
  • Move the drone so the shadow is right above the platform.
  • Press space to release the package.
  • And.. repeat as many times as you can without losing all your health.
